issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK
components.description: Any integration or issues with the TiSDK

fields.description:
h2. full bug log

http://pastie.org/private/t8ouxy9tr307ebiuxvfriq

h2. Solution

Need to make sure that the returned exception object actually has an {{output}} object. I believe this is specific to Python 2.6.x
fields.summary: 'CalledProcessError' object has no attribute 'output' on build
